name: Polar Rescue
overview: Journey to the icy waters beneath the North Pole. As commander of a powerful and highly maneuverable submarine, you must rescue the survivors of ill-fated expedition. Seek out the survivors on your sonar screen and pilot your sub to their rescue! To complete your mission, you must avoid deadly mine fields, enemy submarines and terror of the maelstrom! Monitor your oxygen supply carefully and hurry! Lives are at stake!
